newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SBC opens Houston private banking office.
newsitem.headline: SBC opens Houston private banking office.

text.p: Swiss Bank Corp said it had opened a representative office in Houston to serve investors in the southwestern United States and Mexico.

SBC Private Banking already has branches and offices in New York, Miami, Los Angeles and San Franciso. Some 120 of its more than 2,200 employees in the U.S. are active in private banking, it said in a statement.
